FormalParameter.Name: Calculation data source
FormalParameter.Description: byte array representing CSV or XLSX file for the calculation data source.

FormalParameter.Name: File path to calculation output template
FormalParameter.Description: String representing a file path to calculation output template (CSV or XLSX file).

FormalParameter.Name: File path to calculation
FormalParameter.Description: String representing a file path to calculation file (HTML file generated by Spreadsheet convertor).

FormalParameter.Name: File path to variables definition
FormalParameter.Description: String representing a file path to variables file (CSV or XLSX file which describes the input and output file structure) - can be NULL.

FormalParameter.Name: Calculation data result
FormalParameter.Description: byte array representing CSV or XLSX file for the calculation data result.
